summary:
With a proven track record as a Global Channel Manager at LexisNexis IP (RELX), a prominent Data & Analytics organization, I bring a wealth of experience in driving revenue growth and cultivating impactful partnerships. My career has been characterized by a natural ability to design and implement robust global channel sales strategies, resulting in significant increases in revenue. I am skilled in nurturing collaborative relationships with channel associates worldwide, fostering seamless synergy for remarkable achievements. By aligning cross-functional teams, I successfully execute channel programs that elevate customer engagement and exceed KPIs. Through targeted initiatives and strategic guidance, I consistently enhance channel partner performance, even pioneering the integration of strategic partners in untapped markets to expand our market reach.
Additionally, I have a strong background as the Research Solutions Sales Manager (Africa) for Elsevier (RELX), a globally renowned Scientific, Technology & Medical Publishing Company, which further underscores my commitment to excellence. During my tenure, I cultivated impactful partnerships with diverse stakeholders, consistently exceeding expectations through tailored solutions. This dedication has been recognized through accolades such as the "Walk the Talk" Award and the "Passion for Winning" Award.

Supplementary Courses & Training

•	Incorporating Renewable Energy in Electricity Grids - Imperial College London
•	Sustainable Innovation – LexisNexis
•	Future of Engineering (The Global Impact of China’s Emerging Market) - LexisNexis
•	Challenger Sales Model - LexisNexis
•	Franklin Covey Sales Methodology - Elsevier

education.field_of_study: Graphic Design, Advertising, Marketing & Copy writing

profile_positions.description:
•	Orchestrated and executed dynamic global channel sales strategies for LexisNexis IP products and services, driving a substantial upswing in revenue growth. 
•	Cultivated and nurtured robust global partnerships with channel associates, fostering seamless collaboration and synergistic accomplishments. 
•	Aligned and synchronized cross-functional teams harmoniously, orchestrating flawlessly executed channel programs that markedly enhanced customer engagement. 
•	Revitalized channel partner performance beyond KPIs through meticulous targeted enablement initiatives, achieving noteworthy outcomes. 
•	Elevated sales outcomes by precisely evaluating and strategically advising channel partners, refining sales approaches and tactics. 
•	Spearheaded the identification and integration of strategic channel partners in previously unexplored markets, demonstrably expanding market reach. 
•	Equipped channel partners with strong product knowledge and adept sales techniques, notably the “Challenger sales methodology”, through comprehensive training and support efforts. 
•	Pioneered ambitious business plans that optimized channel servicing costs while concurrently augmenting operational speed, precision, and customer satisfaction. 
•	Proactively monitored market dynamics, competitive landscape, and customer preferences, leading to the precise calibration of strategies, resulting in robust revenue expansion. 
•	Collaborated closely with leadership, propelling ongoing improvement initiatives that streamlined sales efficiency, directly contributing to escalated sales achievements.

Key Achievements: 
Successfully secured a six-figure tender with the Saudi Arabian Government, within in 3 months of taking on the role as Global Channel Manager
profile_positions.title: LexisNexisIP - Global Channel Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Strategically amplified sales performance by skilfully identifying and leveraging novel business prospects within the IP/Research & Development sector, resulting in substantial growth. 
•	Cultivated and nurtured enduring client relationships, adeptly comprehending their needs and seamlessly tailoring solutions to maximize revenue generation. 
•	Skilfully negotiated contracts and agreements, securing advantageous terms that not only optimized revenue growth but also elevated customer satisfaction. 
•	Utilized CRM solutions to meticulously monitor sales performance, furnishing senior management with insightful reports and forecasts crucial for informed decision-making. 
•	Crafted persuasive presentations and proposals that effectively highlighted the distinctive selling propositions of LexisNexisIP products and services. 
•	Spearheaded the widespread adoption of the Challenger-based selling approach, consistently elevating essential value-based milestones and delivering innovative customer-centric solutions. 
•	Demonstrated a strong understanding of products, skilfully articulating the value and benefits of LexisNexisIP offerings to clients. 
•	Conducted exhaustive market research and competitive analysis, pinpointing pivotal market trends and employing product differentiation strategies to gain a competitive edge. 
•	Proactively engaged in industry conferences and events, effectively enhancing brand visibility, and expertly seizing invaluable sales opportunities.

Key Achievements: 
Successfully presented at London IP Week, focusing on Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and showcasing LexisNexisIP solutions.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager - UK, Africa, Middle East

profile_positions.description:
•	Fostered deep trust and established impactful partnerships with a diverse array of stakeholders, including Researchers, Corporates, and Consortium Leaders, through the delivery of tailored solutions that consistently exceeded expectations. 
•	Strategically cultivated and secured a robust pipeline, meticulously aligned with 2022 quotas, resulting in an impressive conversion rate within my designated region. 
•	Masterfully executed the “Franklin Covey” value-based selling approach, continuously advancing the adoption of crucial value-based milestones that amplified client satisfaction. 
•	Formulated and executed a comprehensive customer engagement plan, precisely delineating each step and diligently documenting progress within Salesforce. 
•	Expertly identified and capitalized on pivotal renewal opportunities harmonizing with the compelling Better Together value proposition. 
•	Demonstrated adeptness in executing timely and cost-effective renewals, with an unwavering focus on minimizing attrition rates and preserving client relationships. 
•	Spearheaded business expansion by deftly leveraging upsell and cross-sell prospects within a diverse portfolio encompassing Journals, eBooks, Research Intelligence, Life Sciences, and Engineering. 
•	Actively championed the customer's perspective in the realm of monetizable innovation and product development initiatives, with specific emphasis on driving Research Intelligence (RI) and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to the forefront

Key Achievements:
•	Received the prestigious "Walk the Talk" Award from the Vice President in March 2022, securing a distinguished place in the EMLA hall of fame.
•	Recognized with the "Passion for Winning" Award at the RSS world sales conference in February 2022.
Successfully overachieved the 2021 sales quota of $1,400 million USD.
•	Secured the EMEA H1 3rd place award for surpassing the 2022 sales quota
profile_positions.title: Research Solutions Sales Manager - Africa

profile_positions.description:
•	Spearheaded and orchestrated strategic initiatives that significantly elevated the adoption of eBook and Journal solutions across the expansive EMLA region. 
•	Directed focused endeavours towards expanding the eBook customer base from within the existing Journal clientele, yielding remarkable increases in revenue and market reach. 
•	Successfully executed the innovative Better Together Strategy by meticulously identifying crucial journal renewals and proactively exploring novel avenues that seamlessly align with the value proposition of synergizing Books and Journals. 
•	Achieved a substantial upsurge in eBook penetration among customers with established Journal subscriptions, deftly capitalizing on cross-selling potential. 
•	Targeted and engaged current Journal clients, effectively facilitating the acquisition of new eBook customers, a feat that contributed to noteworthy revenue expansion. 
•	Pioneered the establishment and standardization of a systematic process for capturing comprehensive win/loss notes within Salesforce. This initiative enabled structured collection of invaluable customer feedback across all RSS products and services. 
•	Leveraged insights gleaned from the 2019 EOS and Office-Vibe results to drive data-backed enhancements in employee engagement. This proactive approach resulted in the formulation and seamless execution of actionable plans.
profile_positions.title: Research Solution Sales (EMLA) Internal Sales

profile_positions.description:
•	Propelled revenue growth by proactively initiating order solicitation, intimately understanding customer needs, and nurturing enduring client relationships. 
•	Employed meticulous competitor analysis to precisely identify sales opportunities, forging connections and cultivating prospects through adept research and rapport-building. • Display exceptional proficiency in swiftly closing new accounts, promptly responding to inquiries, and meticulously ensuring accuracy in information entry. 
•	Forged seamless collaboration with fulfilment teams, effectively ensuring order completion and expertly managing delivery expectations. 
•	Spearheaded account expansion efforts by capitalizing on customer history insights, adeptly recommending pertinent products to drive sustained growth. 
•	Demonstrated expertise in maintaining and troubleshooting communication equipment, ensuring uninterrupted seamless functionality. 
•	Elevated quality benchmarks by rigorously adhering to established protocols while proactively suggesting process enhancements to bolster efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Research Solution Sales (EMLA) Health Science - Internal Sales
